sources.src/js/views/recipeView.js:
import View from './View.js'; // import icons from '../img/icons.svg'; // Parcel 1 import icons from '../../img/icons.svg'; // Parcel 2 class RecipeView extends View { _parentElement = document.querySelector('.recipe'); _errorMessage = 'We could not find that recipe. Please try another one!'; _message = ''; addHandlerRender(handler) { ['hashchange', 'load'].forEach(ev => window.addEventListener(ev, handler)); } _generateMarkup() { return `
${ this._data.cookingTime } minutes
${ this._data.servings } servings

Recipe ingredients

    ${this._data.ingredients .map(this._generateMarkupIngredient) .join('')}

How to cook it

This recipe was carefully designed and tested by ${ this._data.publisher }. Please check out directions at their website.

Directions
`; } _generateMarkupIngredient(ing) { return `
  • ${ing.quantity}
    ${ing.unit} ${ing.description}
    • `; } } export default new RecipeView();
